data.title: Seasonal Forecast of South China Sea Summer Monsoon Onset Disturbed by Cold Tongue La Niña in the Past Decade
data.meta_description: It has been suggested that a warm (cold) ENSO event in winter is mostly followed by a late (early) onset of the South China Sea (SCS) summer monsoon (SCSSM
data.text:
